name: Bru-El: Tests of Righteousness
description:
Thank you for coming to my game page ( ^ _^)/

This is my first itch Upload, my first Complete Game that I made by myself, and it is also my coursework for my uni course. 

This was inspired by one of the D&D campaigns that I was player at. I was playing as Bru-El, ilmatrian Cleric. During my campaign, I made a deal with a devil (as one would do when they are desperate) which lead me to being cursed and lose the ability to heal Humans [FYI: ilmater is a God of Humans (mostly)]  When I had to make this game, I originally thought of making story based on Drizzt and how he obtained his weapons, but I realised copyright is a thing, and I preferred to be more original, so I made this based on my own character's adventure. Bru-El cleric of ilmater, son of forgotten house of Shiro-EL. I am assuming it be having few bugs, I will try to see if I can find them and fix them, feel free to contact me if you found any, or you think I should quit trying to be a game designer or (who knows) you liked the puzzles and the game, and you wanted to complement me... Go ahead :3 I would really like that. 

If bugs are found, let me know and I will try to fix it as soon as I get free time.

[Thank you again (^_^)/   ]

p.s this game has 3 possible endings, Good Luck!
